description.english: Complete One Life mode
description.russian: Пройти игру в режиме одной жизни.

description.english: Unlock Sins of an Empire's epilogue.

description.tchinese: 完成帝國之罪的第三幕。
description.japanese: リンクアタックをする

description.english: Deflect an enemy attack with a perfect block.

description.english: Complete a 50-chain.
description.japanese: 50チェインを達成

description.english: Complete a 100-chain.
description.schinese: 通过完美格挡偏转一次敌人的攻击。

description.english: Find a celestial gem.
